passives.effects: While your ''Promised'' ally is {{tt|tethered|1250 units, center to edge}} to you, gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|20% of ''Promised'' ally's AP}}, and grant your ''Promised'' ally {{as|ability haste}} equal to {{as|20% of your ability haste}}.

active.name: Promise
active.effects: Make a ''Promise'' to the target allied champion, forming a {{tip|tether}} between you and them.

passives.name: Char
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] and [[champion ability|ability]] hits against enemies {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% of target's '''current''' health}} and apply a burn that deals {{as|4|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 8% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of target's '''missing''' health)}} {{as|physical damage}} every second over 4 seconds.

4401.name: Force of Nature

passives.name: Steadfast
passives.effects: Taking {{as|magic damage}} from champions grants a stack of ''Steadfast'' for 7 seconds, stacking up to 8 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent {{as|magic damage}} from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per {{tip|cast instance}} can only grant 1 stack of ''Steadfast'' every 1 second. At '''maximum''' stacks, gain {{as|70 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} and {{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}.

passives.name: Doing Something
passives.effects: You are permanently [[File:On Fire! buff.png|20px|link=]] '''On Fire!''', causing you to burn nearby enemies every second for {{as|magic damage}}.

passives.name: Hypershot
passives.effects: Dealing [[Ability_effects#Triggering_from_champion_ability_damage|ability damage]] to a champion at {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 600 or more units away from the cast position {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them and increases your damage dealt to them by 10% for 6 seconds.

passives.name: Focus
passives.effects: Upon triggering ''Hypershot'', grant {{tip|sight}} of the {{tt|area|Grants sight through terrain and brush}} {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1400 units around the target and apply ''Hypershot's'' effects to enemy champions within the area for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Spelldance
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy champion grants you {{as|{{pp|25 to 60}} '''bonus''' movement speed|ms}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Annul
passives.effects: Grants a {{tip|spell shield}} that blocks the next hostile ability.

passives.name: Void Corruption
passives.effects: For each second [[combat status|in combat]] with champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 5 times for a total of 10%. At maximum stacks, gain {{as|{{rd|10%|6%}} omnivamp}}.

passives.name: Void Infusion
passives.effects: Gain {{as|ability power}} equal to {{as|2% '''bonus''' health}}.

passives.name: Soulrend
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] deals {{as|125 {{as|(+ 25% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} '''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}} and grants you {{as|40% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, with the duration extending on subsequent triggers.

passives.name: Sinister Pact
passives.effects: Increase your {{as|ability power}} by {{as|4%|ap}} for every {{as|300 '''current''' health}} you are missing, up to a {{as|40%|ap}} increase at {{as|3000 '''current''' health}} missing.

active.name: Price of Power
active.effects: Pay a {{tip|health resource|health cost}} of {{as|300 '''current''' health}} to gain {{as|100% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over 3 seconds. This effect '''cannot''' reduce the user below {{as|1 health}}.

passives.name: Arcane Cache
passives.effects: This item can store up to 3 purchased {{ii|Control Ward|Control Wards}}.

passives.name: Arcane Cache
passives.effects: This item can store up to 3 purchased {{ii|Control Ward|Control Wards}}.

passives.name: Behold
passives.effects: Increase your {{tip|Stealth Ward}}, {{tip|Totem Ward}}, and {{tip|Control Ward}} caps by 1.

passives.name: Safeguard
passives.effects: Become ''Safeguarded'' to reduce incoming champion damage by 40%, lingering for 3 seconds after taking damage from a champion.

passives.name: Cinderbloom
passives.effects: {{as|Magic damage}} and {{as|true damage}} {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} against enemies below {{as|35% '''maximum''' health}} for 120% damage, increased to 130% for [[damage over time]] effects and damage dealt by [[pets]].

passives.name: Stormraider
passives.effects: Dealing damage to an enemy champion equal to {{as|35% of their '''maximum''' health}} within {{fd|2.5}} seconds inflicts them with ''Squall'' and grants you {{as|25% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Squall
passives.effects: After 2 seconds of having applied ''Squall'', strike the target with lightning, dealing {{as|{{rd|140|105}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{rd|20%|15%}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to them. If the target dies before being struck, they emit an electric field instantly that shocks all enemy champions near them, dealing them the same damage and granting you {{g|30}}.

passives.name: Watch Them Fall
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} or {{tip|ground|grounding}} an enemy champion summons a comet above them that lands at their current location after 1 second, dealing {{as|{{pp|50 to 150}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}} {{as|(+ 4% of your '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within the area.

passives.name: Ignore Pain

passives.name: Defy
passives.effects: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes ''Ignore Pain's'' remaining stored damage and {{tip|heals}} you for {{as|75% '''bonus''' AD}} over 2 seconds.

passives.name: Hackshorn
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemy champions inflicts them with {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Lightshield Strike
passives.effects: Your next basic attack against a champion is empowered to {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} for {{tt|175% damage|Affected by critical damage modifiers}} and {{tip|heal}} you for {{as|{{rd|120%|60%}} '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 6% of your '''missing''' health)}}. Excess healing beyond {{as|'''maximum''' health}} is converted to {{as|'''bonus''' health}} for 8 seconds.

6616.name: Staff of Flowing Water

passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} allied champions (''excluding yourself'') grants you and them {{as|30 ability power}} and {{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 4 seconds.

passives.name: Starlit Grace

If no other allied champions are in the radius, grant the same target an additional 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield.

passives.name: Soul Siphon
passives.effects: Damaging an enemy champion with a basic attack or [[ability damage]] grants a ''Soul Shard'', up to 2. {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion (''excluding yourself'') consumes all ''Soul Shards'' to heal them for 75 per shard and deal {{as|60 magic damage}} per shard to the nearest enemy champion within 1100 units of the ally.

passives.name: First Light
passives.effects: Gain {{as|2% heal and shield power|hsp}} and {{as|10 ability power}} for every additional {{as|100% '''base''' mana regeneration}}.

passives.name: Cleave
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] deal {{as|{{rd|40% AD|20% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 350 radius centered around the target.

passives.name: Temper
passives.effects: Dealing {{as|physical damage}} grants you {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

active.name: Breaking Shockwave
active.effects: Deal {{as|80% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius centered around you and {{tip|slow}} them by 35% for 3 seconds. For each champion hit, gain {{as|35% '''bonus''' movement speed}} decaying over 3 seconds. Can move while casting.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|160% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|4%|2%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]], for a '''minimum''' of {{as|160% '''base''' AD}}. If the target is a champion, {{tip|heal}} for {{as|{{ap|160*0.4}}% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ {{rd|{{ap|4*0.4}}%|{{ap|2*0.4}}%}} of target's '''maximum''' health)|health}}.

6653.name: Liandry's Torment

passives.name: Torment
passives.effects: Dealing [[ability damage]] burns enemies, causing them to take{{ft|{{as|1% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds over 3 seconds, capped at 25 per tick against monsters.|{{as|6% of the target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|'''total''' magic damage}} over 3 seconds, capped at 150 against monsters.}}

passives.name: Suffering
passives.effects: For each second in combat with enemy champions, deal 2% increased damage, stacking up to 3 times for a total of 6%.

Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy consumes all ''Shot Charges'' to deal {{as|60|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 4% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to them and, for each charge consumed beyond the first, an additional enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 600 units of them, firing an orb at each secondary target that impacts after {{rutngt|0.5}} to deal the damage. If the number of additional targets fired at is less than the number of charges consumed,{{ft|deal an additional {{as|{{pp|60*0.5 to 60*5*0.5 for 5|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|4*0.5 to 4*5*0.5 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target, for a total of {{as|{{pp|(60*0.5)+60 to (60*5*0.5)+60 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(4*0.5)+4 to (4*5*0.5)+4 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Shot Charges''|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}}.|deal an additional 50% damage to the primary target for each remaining charge.}}

active.name: Glaciate
active.effects: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|150|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to enemies struck within and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 70% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are {{tip|root|rooted}} for the same duration instead.

Upon reaching maximum stacks, gain a level that preserves your current experience (cap remains at level 18).

passives.name: Immolate

This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.

6662.name: Iceborn Gauntlet

active.name: Cloudburst II

Each missile deals {{as|{{pp|150/3 to 350/3|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ {{fd|26.6{{recurring|6}}}}% '''bonus''' AD)}} physical damage|physical damage}}, for a total of {{as|{{pp|150 to 350|1;8 to 18 by 1}} {{as|(+ 80% '''bonus''' AD)}}|physical damage}}, increased by {{pp|type= target's '''missing''' health|color=health|key=%|0 to 50|key1=%|0 to 75 for 11|formula=5% per 7.5% of enemies' '''missing''' health}}.

passives.name: Lifeline

passives.name: Transcendence

passives.name: Death

passives.name: Taxes

Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them renders you {{tip|untargetable}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds, which ends prematurely if you perform an action that {{tip|break stealth|breaks stealth}}.

passives.name: Ever Rising Moon

Applying 2 stacks to a champion within a 2 second period deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to them equal to {{as|{{rd|6%|4%}} of target's '''maximum''' health}} and grants you a {{tip|shield}} for {{rd|160|80}} {{as|(+ {{rd|40%|{{fd|20}}%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Sandstrike
passives.effects: Using a {{tip|dash}}, {{tip|lunge}} or {{tip|blink}}, or exiting from {{tip|stealth}}, empowers your next basic attack against a champion within 3 seconds to deal {{as|{{rd|85|65}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{rd|55%|35%}} '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{rd|35%|20%}} AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and {{tip|slow}} the target by 99% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Rancor
passives.effects: Gain {{as|25% (+ {{fd|0.11}}% per 1 Lethality) [[armor penetration]]|armor penetration}}.

passives.name: Bitter Cold

passives.name: Shield Reaver

passives.name: Flux
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them refunds 10% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}}% per 1 Lethality)}} of your ultimate ability's '''total''' cooldown.

passives.name: Eminence
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them generates a permanent stack and grants you {{as|15|ad}} (+ 2 per stack) {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} for 90 seconds.

passives.name: Cleave
passives.effects: Damaging basic attacks deal {{as|{{rd|50% AD|25% AD}}|ad}} {{as|physical damage}} to other enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 450 radius centered around the target.

active.name: Heretical Cleave
active.effects: Deal {{as|100% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 450 radius, increased to {{as|130% AD}} against those below {{as|50% '''maximum''' health}}.

passives.name: Galvanize
passives.effects: {{tip|Energized}} stack generation is increased by 75% for distance travelled from {{tip|dash|dashes}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}}, as well as while moving in {{tip|stealth}}.

passives.name: Firmament
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|100 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by {{rd|99%|20%}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

passives.name: Preparation
passives.effects: After being [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] with enemy champions for 8 seconds, gain {{as|{{rd|5;5.5 to 10.5 for 11|5*0.6;5.5*0.6 to 10.5*0.6 for 11|levels=1;8 to 18|pp=true}} lethality}}. This bonus remains for 3 seconds after dealing damage to an enemy champion.

passives.name: Extraction
passives.effects: Scoring a {{tip|takedown}} against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants you {{as|200 '''bonus''' movement speed}} that decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds.

passives.name: Vendetta
passives.effects: Take 20% reduced damage from your ''Nemesis'' and reduce their tenacity by 20% while they are within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 700 units of you.

active.name: Vow

passives.name: Unmake
passives.effects: Enemy champions within {{tt|600 units|center to edge}} of you become cursed, {{as|reducing their {{as|magic resistance}} by 20%|magic penetration}}. Gain {{as|10 '''bonus''' magic resistance}} per cursed enemy.

passives.name: Agricultural Reaper
